name: Torreznator Burger
description: Juicy beef, cheddar, crispy pork cracklings, smoked bacon, fried egg, caramelized onions, and Smoky Torrezno sauce.

name: CocoBurweb Burger
description: Spiced meat with coconut-curry sauce, sriracha, fresh veggies, fried rice chips, Gruyère, and blue cheese in a garlic black butter brioche bun.

name: Smashmelon Burger
description: Beef and lamb with truffle Havarti, tahini-honey-tamarind sauce, watermelon radish, mint, and mango kimchi in a brioche bun with olive oil and orange zest.

name: Four Cheese Burweb Burger
description: Beef with mozzarella, gorgonzola, parmesan, provolone, roasted garlic sauce, caramelized tomatoes, and pizza dough chips.

name: Kebab 2.0 Burger
description: Beef-lamb patty with tzatziki, onion, tomato, feta, and zaatar pita chips in a garlic butter brioche bun.

name: Police Fav. Burger
description: Donut bun with beef, homemade bacon jam, caramelized onions, pickles, caramelized apple, and arugula.

name: Simply Burweb Burger
description: Classic beef patty with cheddar, tomato, lettuce, onion, and pickles in a lightly toasted brioche bun.

name: Simply ChickenBurweb Burger
description: Ground chicken with mayo, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and toasted bun.

name: Iberian Burweb Burger
description: Beef and pork belly with acorn-fed Iberian ham, sun-dried tomato sauce, Manchego, caramelized onions, and piquillo peppers.

name: HotBurweb Burger
description: Spicy chicken with chipotle yogurt sauce, lime, pickled jalapeños, red onion, and tortilla chips in a toasted brioche bun.

name: Cheeseburweb Burger
description: Beef with aged cheddar, mustard-honey-curry sauce, confit tomato, dill pickles, and caramelized pancetta in a butter-toasted bun.

name: Golden Bliss Burweb Dessert Burger
description: Banana bread "bun" with oat-honey patty, Greek yogurt cream, citrus-ginger sauce, fruits, and toasted almonds.

name: Sweet Smash Deluxe Dessert Burger
description: Molten chocolate brownie patty, donuts as buns, mascarpone cream, salted caramel, coffee ganache, fruits, and marshmallows.

name: BurJunior Burger
description: Mini beef patty with cheddar, mustard, ketchup, and soft toasted bun.

name: French Friesweb
description: Thin, crispy fries, lightly salted.

name: Potato Webges
description: Thick-cut crispy wedges, lightly salted.

name: Fries BaconCheese
description: Crispy fries topped with melted cheddar and bacon bits.

name: Burcream Lotus Ice Cream
description: Creamy Lotus biscuit ice cream with crunchy bits and a caramelized touch.

name: Burcream Strawberry Ice Cream
description: Smooth, fruity strawberry ice cream with creamy texture.

name: Burcream Chocolate Ice Cream
description: Rich, creamy chocolate ice cream with a perfect balance of sweetness.

name: Burcream Oreo Ice Cream
description: Creamy Oreo ice cream with real cookie crumbles.

name: Burshake Strawberry Shake
description: A refreshing, creamy shake made with strawberry ice cream, delivering fruity flavor and a smooth texture with a natural strawberry touch.

name: Burshake Chocolate Shake
description: A rich and velvety shake made with chocolate ice cream, offering a perfect balance of sweetness and deep cocoa flavor.

name: Burweb Nachos
description: Crunchy corn chips topped with melted cheddar cheese, spicy jalapeño sauce, and a dollop of sour cream.

name: Burweb Nuggets
description: Crispy, breaded chicken nuggets with a tender, juicy interior.

name: Classic Burweb Salad
description: Crisp romaine and baby spinach with fresh tomato, cucumber, carrots, feta, and toasted sesame seeds, dressed in olive oil and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Burweb Onion Rings
description: Crispy, golden-brown onion rings with a soft, juicy interior—perfect for any burger.

name: Classic Coca-Cola - Can
description: A refreshing, fizzy classic with a sweet and tangy flavor, perfect for pairing with any Burweb meal.

name: Coca-Cola Zero Sugar - Can
description: The classic Coca-Cola flavor, now sugar-free for a light, refreshing option.

name: Coca-Cola Zero Zero - Can
description: Zero calories and zero sugar, delivering the same iconic Coca-Cola taste in a lighter formula.

name: Fanta Lemon - Can
description: A zesty, lemon-flavored, fizzy drink that adds a citrusy twist to your Burweb meal.

name: Fanta Lemon Zero - Can
description: Sugar-free Fanta Lemon with all the citrusy freshness and none of the calories.

name: Fanta Orange - Can
description: A fizzy, sweet orange soda that perfectly complements your Burweb burger or snack.

name: Fanta Orange Zero - Can
description: Sugar-free Fanta Orange, with all the sweet, fruity flavor and zero calories.

name: Sprite - Can
description: A classic lemon-lime soda, perfectly refreshing and citrusy to pair with any Burweb dish.

name: Water - Bottle
description: Fresh, purified water to balance your meal and keep you hydrated.

name: Torreznator Menu Cocacola
description: Burger with 250g beef, torreznos, fried egg, bacon, and Fries BaconCheese, served with CocaCola.

name: Torreznator Menu Water
description: Burger with 250g beef, torreznos, fried egg, bacon, and Fries BaconCheese, served with water.

name: Iberian Burweb Menu Cocacola
description: Gourmet burger with beef, Iberian ham, Manchego cheese, caramelized onions, and Coca-Cola.

name: Iberian Burweb Menu Water
description: Burger with beef, Iberian ham, Manchego cheese, caramelized onions, piquillos, and water.

name: HotBurweb Menu
description: Spicy chicken burger with chipotle sauce, jalapeños, red peppers, BurNachos, and water.

name: Bathroom Menu: Kebab 2.0
description: Beef-lamb burger with tzatziki sauce, fried pita, and BurCream Oreo.

name: Junior Menu: BurJunior
description: Classic burger with beef, cheddar, ketchup, mustard, fries, and chocolate ice cream.

name: Police Fav. Burger Menu
description: Burger with donut, bacon jam, caramelized apple, wedges, and chocolate milkshake.

name: Health Menu: Smashmelon
description: Healthy burger with beef-lamb, Havarti cheese, tahini, mango kimchi, strawberry shake, and BurSalad.

name: MegaCheesy Menu: Cheese Lovers Dream
description: Burger with 4 cheeses, fries with cheese, pizza dough chips, and Fanta or Coca-Cola.

name: Double Burshake Menu: Classic Comfort x2
description: Double burgers with cheddar, classic fries, Deluxe Fries, and chocolate and strawberry shakes.
